Welcome to Strømpris’ documentation!¶

Do you want to know how the energy prices have developed in your region in Norway? Then this is the right tool for you!

Using the Strømpris web app you can download the electricity prices of five regions within Norway to make nice and informative plots of the energy prices in NOK per kWh as a function of time.
